text:
RT @Local12 Do you like this proposal?

Senator Ted Cruz introduces term limit constitutional amendment: https://local12.com/news/nation-world/senator-ted-cruz-introduces-term-limit-constitutional-amendment http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwPgVPeWoAEDA5C.jpg

It’s absurd that the first bill during the shutdown is legislation which punishes Americans who exercise their constitutional right to engage in political activity. Democrats must block consideration of any bills that don’t reopen the government. Let's get our priorities right. https://twitter.com/theintercept/status/1081664403622252544 QT @theintercept U.S. Senate's first bill, in midst of shutdown, is a bipartisan defense of the Israeli government from boycotts https://trib.al/9BA5D0q by @ryangrim @ggreenwald

ICYMI: Congress is a few steps closer to reflecting the diversity and cultures of the people we represent.
https://www.cnn.com/2019/01/03/politics/new-congress-history-women-diversity/index.html

Heartbroken with the tragic passing of Officer Joseph Shinners last night in the line duty—a loving husband and new father. Ann and I extend our deepest condolences to Officer Shinners' family, friends, and fellow @ProvoPolice officers. God bless our men and women in uniform.

@RuPaul Mother Ru,

Thank you for your shining example of loving ourselves in our entirety, no matter what the world thinks. You give me hope and strength every day!

I always say to women: “Be yourself. Be who you are.” When you go into the arena, you understand that you will be a target – and that isn’t anything that should keep you out of the arena. #SundayMorning http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1081944181373849600/img/yV0a4quvyXuIp_NF.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1081944181373849600/vid/320x180/wdEhg0L9xUQC9k82.mp4?tag=9

RT @_waleedshahid Pundits like to frame @AOC’s battles in simple win or loss terms but they miss how she’s shifting the entire political terrain toward working class people and a bold progressive agenda.

👏🏾Changing👏🏾the👏🏾whole👏🏾game👏🏾 https://twitter.com/daveweigel/status/1082013382058930182 QT @daveweigel Not getting a ton of attention today, but IMO Julian Castro's answer to a question about @AOC's tax talk was striking. 

"George, there was a time in this country where the top marginal tax rate was over 90 percent."

and *woosh* goes the Overton Window. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwQVa7FWkAMZgmm.jpg

Irony of this typical Anti-U.S. piece on #Cuba is it extols self-employed Cubans but bashes new U.S. policy which empowers them.

U.S. travelers allowed to spend unlimited $ at self employed businesses but can no longer spend any $ at military owned ones. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/01/05/opinion/sunday/cubas-next-transformation.html

A quick note to you all.

Let us never, ever, ever give up. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwNHUunWwAAZb6x.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwNHUumWsAE2dXp.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwNHUumXgAATi4r.jpg

Our state has helped to keep Utah's five national parks open during this shutdown. I applaud @Interior for releasing additional funds dedicated toward the basic needs and public safety in our parks. Special thanks to my Utah House colleagues for their efforts to make this happen.

RT @JuanMaBenitez You might not agree with congresswoman @AOC’s policy proposals, but that @60Minutes @andersoncooper intvw showed she’s not a lightweight like many expected her to be. She’s connecting with tons of people (and her ideas are not that radical, they are pretty mainstream in Europe.)

This admin clearly had enough extra money to spontaneously build child detention camps all along the southern border + conduct a massive, cross-country family-separation operation.

If anything, DHS’s horrific actions last year means we should consider budget cuts, not increases.

RT @SenatorRomney Heartbroken with the tragic passing of Officer Joseph Shinners last night in the line duty—a loving husband and new father. Ann and I extend our deepest condolences to Officer Shinners' family, friends, and fellow @ProvoPolice officers. God bless our men and women in uniform.

RT @RickSmithShow In seeing a mass conservative freak out over @AOC calling for a progressive tax code that taxes extreme wealth and wondering if they understand that the top marginal tax rate under GOP Pres. Dwight D. Eisenhower was 92% and we still had our beloved wars AND rich people

Sen. Van Hollen is absolutely right. We should block consideration of all bills on the Senate floor until we end the Trump shutdown and reopen the federal government. https://twitter.com/chrisvanhollen/status/1081612549332877312 QT @ChrisVanHollen Senate Democrats should block consideration of any bills unrelated to opening the government until Sen. Mitch McConnell and Senate Republicans allow a vote on the bipartisan bills the House passed to open the government. Mitch, don’t delay. Let’s vote!

This week the Senate will begin debate on our bill to support #Israel, #Jordan & our other allies in Middle East.  
 https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/the_americas/trump-aide-syria-withdrawal-waiting-on-conditions/2019/01/06/f3236a8a-11a2-11e9-ab79-30cd4f7926f2_story.html
Responding to the threat posed by Iran and its proxies requires ensuring that Israel can defend its territory and its citizens from attacks.

The House of Representatives should be America’s Town Hall – but the GOP used every tool at their disposal to shut down the free flow of ideas. We need to do better #ForThePeople.

ICYMI: @RepRooney and I introduced an amendment to the U.S. Constitution to impose term limits on members of Congress. The amendment would limit U.S. senators to two six-year terms and members of the U.S. House of Representatives to three two-year terms. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1081999759810969605/pu/img/Hid7bK58BpNprtuw.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1081999759810969605/pu/vid/320x180/ey2jVBsTJ_QTI6aU.mp4?tag=6

Rooting for Black Panther at the #GoldenGlobes tonight! One of my favorite movies of 2018. An incredible story and set design that brought Wakanda to life. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwRmiFwW0AA1drp.jpg

“She doesn’t know what she’s talking about,”
say Republicans, who argued that healthcare costs the same as as unlimited calls & texts.

At least they’re upholding the time-honored tradition of laymen doubting the intelligence of women with actual subject matter education. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwO9TFyWwAASW4U.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwO9TFzWkAE-BmU.jpg

Happy Three Kings Day everyone!

I strongly reiterate my support for Taiwan as an independent democracy and strong ally of the United States. The U.S. must do more to strengthen ties with Taipei in the face of China’s increasingly aggressive actions and rhetoric. https://edition.cnn.com/2019/01/02/asia/xi-jinping-taiwan-tsai-intl/index.html?utm_term=image&utm_content=2019-01-03T17%3A41%3A16&utm_source=twCNNi&utm_medium=social

Here is one perfect example: many of ICE’s black-box detention centers are run by for-profit corporations.

That means our public dollars are going to sky-high profits for private prison operators and their shareholders.

https://www.nytimes.com/2018/10/01/us/prisons-immigration-detention.amp.html

It’s been two weeks since Trump shut down the government and the Republican-controlled Congress let the Violence Against Women Act expire. 
https://twitter.com/civilrightsorg/status/1081289269061259265 QT @civilrightsorg Domestic violence shelters across the country are cobbling together funds to keep their doors open as the government shutdown hits the two-week mark. https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/government-shutdown-domestic-violence-shelters_us_5c2e7ee7e4b08aaf7a97a9fe

RT @60Minutes Ocasio-Cortez’s was working as a waitress and bartender when she decided to run for Congress.  Like many millennials, she had student loans to pay and no health insurance. “When you can’t have healthcare, that is not dignified,” she says. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-the-rookie-congresswoman-challenging-the-democratic-establishment-60-minutes-interview-full-transcript-2019-01-06/?ftag=CNM-00-10aab7d&linkId=62017599 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1082067557207760896/pu/img/ZrW5Mdz26jWJ44pQ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1082067557207760896/pu/vid/320x320/2CPTDozSupxPiYe5.mp4?tag=6

As a result of Trump's government shutdown, many federal employees will be unable to pay their mortgages or feed their kids. The Senate's first act must be to re-open the government.  

Leader McConnell: Let the Senate vote on the House bills to re-open the government.

RT @RepPressley 800k workers are without pay as the shutdown drags on. 2,000 of those workers who make up the backbone of our government in food service & janitorial services won’t qualify for backpay when the gov reopens. Today I wrote to leadership because we need to fix this: @SEIU @32BJSEIU http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwQEgvVUYAE5vvy.jpg

RT @JordanUhl Anderson Cooper: How are you going to pay for all of this?

@AOC: Nobody asks how we're going to pay for the 'space force' http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1082068802878136320/pu/img/x7YZfpAYSv4hLXkP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1082068802878136320/pu/vid/318x180/tz9fLBoN9h9QYQda.mp4?tag=6

Ayer la @AsambleaVA eligió al diputado @jguadio como el presidente de la Asamblea Nacional. Felicito a Juan Guaidó, quien liderará la única institución democrática que apoya el retorno de los valores democráticos en #Venezuela.

Ayer la @AsambleaVE eligió al diputado @jguaido como el presidente de la Asamblea Nacional. Felicito a Juan Guaidó, quien liderará la única institución democrática que apoya el retorno de los valores democráticos en #Venezuela.

Yesterday, Venezuela’s @AsambleaVA elected Deputy @jguadio as the President of the National Assembly. I congratulate Juan Guaidó, who will lead the only legitimate democratic institution supporting the return of democratic values in #Venezuela.

and *woosh* goes the Overton Window. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwQVa7FWkAMZgmm.jpg

Earlier this week, the House passed a bill to reopen the government. The Senate should vote on it immediately. Federal employees and government contractors should not have to pay the price for the president’s actions.

To support Israel’s right to self defense, Washington should take the long overdue step of affirming Israeli sovereignty over the Golan Heights. —> https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=4251

Mr. President, I doubt very much that you can “relate” to federal workers. 

When is the last time you had to choose between paying your mortgage, feeding your family or putting gas in the car? 

End the shutdown. Pay federal employees. https://twitter.com/thedailybeast/status/1081935253332217857 QT @thedailybeast Trump: "I can relate" to federal workers not getting paid during the shutdown 
https://www.thedailybeast.com/trump-i-can-relate-to-federal-workers-not-getting-paid-during-shutdown?via=twitter_page

The last week has been a flurry of activity, as our new Democratic Majority officially took control of the House & immediately began work to re-open government.

Here’s a quick look at some of the moments that stand out: https://medium.com/@SpeakerPelosi/madam-speaker-a-behind-the-scenes-look-at-the-u-s-speaker-of-the-house-january-3-4-2019-a816c6f5e580

Instead of tax breaks for big wealthy corporations and the top 1%, we should be making our tax code work for middle-class Americans. The LIFT Act does just that by helping address the rising costs of housing, tuition, childcare, and more.

RT @sunrisemvmt Tonight the #GreenNewDeal, @AOC and our movement will be in front of ~ 11 million @60Minutes viewers. 

11 million people will be hearing a discussion about solutions to the climate crisis in line with what the science and justice demand. That's huge. https://twitter.com/60Minutes/status/1081688891462164480 QT @60Minutes “I could have thrown up that morning I was so nervous,” Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez told 60 Minutes about the protest she attended in House leader Nancy Pelosi’s office shortly after being elected. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-call-me-a-radical-60-minutes/ http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1081688813058097153/pu/img/CdMaGqX4yklAlIiy.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1081688813058097153/pu/vid/320x320/ftLjYr9yjj1fJPiO.mp4?tag=6

Isaiah 60:5-6

If the GOP wants a wall so badly, they can try to propose and pass a bill like anybody else. 

Instead, they are seizing gov operations + innocent people’s pay until they get what they want.

This is called hostage-taking. And no one can compromise or negotiate with that. https://twitter.com/leaderhoyer/status/1081646716976353287 QT @LeaderHoyer This week, House Dems passed Senate Republican funding bills to reopen govt. But rather than take up & sign those bills that are agreed on, @SenateMajLdr & @POTUS are refusing to end this #TrumpShutdown. Read how the impact of their shutdown is growing: https://www.majorityleader.gov/content/trump-shutdown-impacts-grow

People stretched around three city blocks last night to attend our first organizing event in Des Moines. This is what a grassroots movement to level the playing field looks like. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwPCstXUYAE4o-q.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwPCsuIV4AEuonF.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwPCsuKUcAEMZZ6.jpg
